record.title: PERSONAL EXPLANATION
record.narrative:
PERSONAL EXPLANATION -- (House of Representatives - September 25, 2007)

[Page: H10816]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker: on Tuesday, September 25, 2007, I had obligations that caused me to miss three votes. Had I been here, I would have voted: "nay" on the Previous Question on the Rule for H.R. 976 (SCHIP). "Nay" on the Rule for H.R. 976 (SCHIP). "Yea" on H. Res. 95 "Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives supporting the goals and ideals of Campus Fire Safety Month, and for other purposes."
